title: The Continued Power of Christianity's Embodied Sacrificial Love
description:
Jonathan Pageau and Kanye West believe in the vision of the Medieval Village. West has the money and power to pursue it in his errand into the wilderness. Both seek to address what Julian and Nick see as our contemporary rootlessness. Even a "gender abolitionist" like Vaush concedes the beauty of the commitment expressed in the tradition marriage. Tom Holland notes the astounding accomplishment of the Gospel authors who somehow flipped the script on humanity's self-centeredness to portray Jesus the victim as the lover we've been longing for. It forces us into a choice. Be a selfish hypocrite who demands to be sacrificially loved by unwilling to love in that way, or give way to the Darwinian vision of one's life at the expense of even our loved ones. 

Julian and Nick on the Randos Channel. https://youtu.be/xrvm2HkS1jg
